document.full_text: morocco has agreed to raise public sector salaries in a handout estimated at more than $5 billion over three years as demands for reform put pressure on the arab world's longest-serving dynasty.
document.title: moroccan unions win wage hikes as protests grow
lines_and_colors: morocco has agreed to raise public sector salaries in a handout estimated at more than $5 billion over three years as demands for reform put pressure on the arab world's longest-serving dynasty.
